My Projects

Catch the Ball

Developed in Android Studio using Java. It is an android mobile game where a player catches as many balls as it can and records the score. Player need to avoid catching the void balls, these void balls would kill the player and finish the game right away. The current and highest overall score achieved displayed at the end.

 Github
Papa Moogic Player

This is an Android music player, developed using Java. This music player uses fingerprint authentication to give access to the user. Once the user has access, the user can play any available music from the mobile phone.

 Github
Motion Detector

Developed using Python and its libraries like opencv2, pandas, and bokeh. This project detects any movement in the frame of the camera and keeps the record in the CSV file; then it shows the result in an HTML document, which visualizes the results from the detector.

 Github
Literacy-Death Rate Analysis

Developed using HTML, Python and its libraries like pandas, numpy, matplotlib, scipy, and tornado. This program analyzes the data sets from the death and literacy rate of south Asia and checks if there is any relation between the two data sets. My hypothesis has been proved true in this project; the initial hypothesis was to prove that if the literacy rate increases then the death rate would decrease. You can use Jupyter notebook to load this project. Check the localhost with http://localhost:5240/3543598/

 Github
RGB Color Guessing Game

Developed using CSS, HTML and Javascript. This game generates random coloured circles and asks the player to choose the matching RGB colour combination. This game has an easy and normal mode, easy mode gives only 4 coloured circles and normal mode gives 6 coloured circles to select the correct combination.

 Github
Windows Calculator

This is an simple windows desktop calculator app. It was built using WPF on visual studio. I used C# and XAML to degine simple calculator.

Github
Command line Dictionary

This dictionary was build using python. It uses large collection of english written word and thier defination. It ask user an input word and outputs meaning of the word.

Github
Volcanos in U.S Webmap

This is a web application built with python. It uses pandas and folium liabray. This web app visualizes the locations and details of volcanos on map.

 Github
Website Blocker

Developed using Python. This program blocks all the disturbing sites during specified time periods and allows them to access them once the period is finished. This is a very good program for people to avoid checking social media sites and entertainment sites during work hours or busy hours. Parents can use this program on the laptop or desktop computer of their children, so children can stay away from disturbing sites. This program currently works only on windows operating systems but it can be used in the UNIX operating system with some changes in code.

 Github
Salary Data Collector

This is a web application which takes your salary and email on website page and then reply you on email the avarage canadian employee salary.

Github
Real Estate Web-Scrapping

Developed using Python and its libraries like requests and beautiful soap. This program scraps the data from real estate and saves its data in a CSV file, then analyze and visualize the data. This scrapping technique can use to scrape data from any website for analysis.

 Github
Desktop CRUD App

This web appication was built with python. It has front and back end of the application. It would allow you to create, read, update, and delete entries from application. Backend end is connected to the relational database tables.

Github
Face Detector

This simple project has script written in python and uses opencv to detect faces from pased images.
